"She seemed kinda... on edge.": "I'm sorry. We've never really had contact with outsiders... I think Meri's just not sure how to approach things."
"Hey, what do you think? We can't just leave things like this, can we?"
"We're worried too, so we should join the search."
"Yeah yeah. We wouldn't just ignore an ARKS in need."
"That's right. We should do our duty and begin searching. There shouldn't be any issues with that."
"Yeah! We have a mission to complete! Even if Meri's against it, we have to go and look for him!"
"I'm sorry for putting you through this trouble. Please, find Ilma for us."
"Your two older brothers are out searching already, correct? Do you have any idea where they might have gone?"
"I'm pretty sure Tulli said he was heading to the research facility. Taivas went towards Lost Central."
"I see. We'll see if we can catch up with them."
"Thanks Kukka! Alright, let's get going! Let Meri know we'll be back before dinner!"
